title: An android port?
body: Just wanted to know what you guys would think of a mobile way to play League :p

replies.body: I already play league by streaming my desktop's output to my tablet. It sucks badly trying to play without a kyeboard/mouse tho.

There are many issues with the idea of a mobile port. In no particular order:

* Most phones can't handle graphics-intensive games
* League needs the sort of fine control that a touch screen cannot provide
* Your fingers would block out parts of the game while you played
* League needs buttons and the lack of haptic feedback would be bad
* Very large installation sizes
* And others

It's not worth the hassle to make a clearly inferior product.

A terrible idea.
I honestly hope it never happens.
